rundown: 2-9 L vs New York Mets Cal Quantrill: 4.2 innings, 3 earned runs, 5 hits, 1 HR, 3 strikeouts Batters: Drake Baldwin (1 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 1 RBI) The Braves suffered a tough loss against the New York Mets, falling 2-9 at home. The Mets capitalized on the Braves' pitching struggles and offensive inefficiencies. Key highlights from the game include: 1. Cal Quantrill struggled on the mound, allowing 3 earned runs before being pulled in the fifth inning. 2. The Braves managed only 5 hits throughout the game, failing to capitalize on scoring opportunities. 3. Drake Baldwin contributed with an RBI, but the team's overall performance was overshadowed by the Mets' offensive onslaught.
